DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the safety and efficacy of an an ultrasound-guided inserted peripheral intravenous catheter during a period of seven days.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Ultrasound-guided Inserted Peripheral Intravenous Catheter
DOC.criteria: Hospitalized patients with need of an intravenous therapy on peripheral line Unsuccessful attempts at establishing a peripheral intravenous line by nurse Age over 18 YO Written informed consent obtained pregnant woman local contraindication for venous puncture unconscious patient need of intravenous therapy requiring central line
